abilities.description: Can create and control darkness to absorb and pull in anything, including people and structures.
Uses darkness powers to 'suck down' guards and gates at Impel Down entrance.

keyMoments.title: Darkness Powers Used to Breach Impel Down
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard uses the Yami Yami no Mi's absorption powers to suck down guards and gates, forcing entry into the Great Prison.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the tactical applications of the Yami Yami no Mi in infiltration and assault scenarios.

weaknesses.description: Unlike other Logia fruits, Yami Yami no Mi does not make the user intangible and actually attracts attacks.

abilities.description: Can create and control various types of deadly poison.
Uses poison powers to quickly suppress large-scale prisoner riots.

keyMoments.title: Magellan Suppresses Level 2 Riot
keyMoments.description: Magellan uses his Doku Doku no Mi powers to efficiently suppress the massive prisoner riot on Level 2.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the overwhelming power of Magellan's poison abilities in controlling large groups.

weaknesses.description: Magellan suffers from diarrhea due to his own poison, limiting his active duty time.
